block.p: Elisabeth Allyn Wing, the daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Thomas E. Wing of Mendham, N.J., was married yesterday to Matthew Thomas Stone, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Richard J. Stone of Allentown, Pa. The Rev. Barbara Edgar, an Episcopal priest, officiated at St. Christopher's Church in Chatham, Mass. The Rev. Richard Roy, a Roman Catholic priest, took part in the service.

Mrs. Stone, 28, is an associate at O'Melveny & Myers, the Los Angeles law firm. She graduated cum laude from Princeton University and received a law degree from Georgetown. Her father is a research scientist in Whippany, N.J., with Lucent Technologies, the telecommunications equipment company.

Elisabeth Allyn Wing, the daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Thomas E. Wing of Mendham, N.J., was married yesterday to Matthew Thomas Stone, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Richard J. Stone of Allentown, Pa. The Rev. Barbara Edgar, an Episcopal priest, officiated at St. Christopher's Church in Chatham, Mass. The Rev. Richard Roy, a Roman Catholic priest, took part in the service.

Mrs. Stone, 28, is an associate at O'Melveny & Myers, the Los Angeles law firm. She graduated cum laude from Princeton University and received a law degree from Georgetown. Her father is a research scientist in Whippany, N.J., with Lucent Technologies, the telecommunications equipment company.

Mr. Stone, also 28, is in the M.B.A. program at the University of California at Los Angeles. He graduated from the University of Pennsylvania. His father retired as an engineering manager in Allentown with the microelectronics division of AT&T.
